ygData.subject: RE: Brad comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Most of that is a bunch of BS. +There are no stat bonuses ADDED to any instruments. +They added the mail delivery quests that everyone can do, and the lambent
ygData.messageBody:
Most of that is a bunch of BS.

+There are no stat bonuses ADDED to any instruments.

+They added the mail delivery quests that everyone can do, and the lambent
quests , but everyone got a new armor quest to deal with the rubicite
problem.

+Class specific items? What from POF and POH? How many? 4?

+Know nothing about the pet thing

+Additional affects to bard songs? Bahh! more like took affects away.

+Added songs? We never had all 50 to begin with.

+We can now punch magic only creatures with magic gloves on for 5 damage 35
delay. I couldn't do that back in April, but I wish I could have because it
would have really helped me ;-P

+Increased the power of some songs? Hrrm, the power for Fufils was
supposedly increased but it is the same as it ever was.

I am sorry to rant, but give me a break. What do they take us for?

-Faras the perturbed


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 10:27 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Brad comments
>
>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> Check out this thread. I posted these comments. Anyone else
> agree with me?
> http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/009312.html
>
> A few observations. Would like a response
>
> + Added stat and other bonuses to instruments
> Where? None of my instrument stats changed for the better IE:
> Bonus? means
> something added, right?
>
> + Added more Class Specific Quests
> Lambent. How about some more? Instruments and such. as it is,
> besides The
> lambent, bards have some pretty poor quests. (4 I think)
>
> + Added more Class Specific Items
> Again, We have very few class specific items. I think they
> added a grand
> total of 5
> Look at warriors. They have millions;)
>
> + Corrected Bug that let monsters attack you from far
> distances through your
> pet
> Didnt know this was an issue, since charm only lasts ten seconds
>
> + Added Addition Effects to Some Bard Songs
> Forgot to mention that Levitate will not work now. Would like
> to know what
> effects were added
>
> + Added New Bard Songs
> New bard songs?, or do you mean, fixed ones that didn't work?
>
> + Added Ability for Bards to Punch 'Magic Only' Creatures
> I thought I could always do this, with magic gloves
>
> + Increased the Power of Some Bard Songs (c.f. Chant Series,
> Fifil's, etc.)
> Hmm, I have not seen any "Increase" in power of bard songs,
> only a decrease
> (IE Lullaby, Lament, Pixie strike, Selo's) Shouldn't there be
> a negative in
> here?
>>
